AccountNameTitleBar: Account Name on the Title Bar
AccountProtectionDesc: Protect your accounts with a unique passcode. Tap the lock icon above your chat list to access them.
AccountProtectionHint1: Tap the lock icon above your chat list to access your hidden accounts.
AccountProtectionHint2: When an account is protected with a passcode, it will be hidden from the side menu.
AppCrashedDesc: AdvanceGram has stopped working. Please, send logs to the developers so that they can fix this bug as soon as possible.
AppLinkNotVerifiedMessage: For Android 12 and newer, you need to manually add link to verified links in order to open t.me links in AdvanceGram.
AutoTranslateDesc: Automatically translate messages that are in another language.
AutoTranslateDesc2: These chats will or will not be translated regardless of the settings above.
AutoTranslateTitle: Do you want auto-translation of messages?
AutomaticSortingDesc: Move recently used custom emoji and sticker sets to the first position
BrokenMLKitDetail: Google MLKit language identifier is somehow broken on this device.
CameraXDesc: CameraX is only supported on selected devices]]>, effects and lenses support depends on your manufacturer.
ChangeIconDesc: Since on Android 12 the monet icon was forced and you upgraded to Android 13, you need to change the app icon to the default one for a better support.
ConfirmCallsDesc: Show confirmation dialog each time you call anyone
CopyReportDetailsDesc: Use when submitting a bug report
CreatePasscodeInfoPIN2: Please enter any 4 digits that you will use to unlock your Telegram account.
CreatePasscodeInfoPassword2: Please enter the password you will use to unlock your Telegram account.
DatacenterStatusDesc: Check the Telegram\'s Datacenter]]> Status in realtime.
DisableAccountProtectionAlert: Are you sure you want to disable the account protection feature?
DisableExperimentalAlert: Are you sure you want to disable experimental settings?\n\nNote that this will disable the Monet Icon.
EditExceptionHint: You can disable auto-translate for specific topics in this group.
EditExceptionTitle: Do you want to edit topics exceptions?
EditRemoveExceptionText: Are you sure you want to delete \"%1$s\" from auto-translate exceptions?
ExperimentalDesc: Try experimental features. Some may not work correctly.
ExperimentalOff: Warning! Those are experimental settings. Some may not work. Others may break the app. Any of them may disappear in the next version without a trace. Use at your own risk.
FlipMediaByTapping: Flip Media by Tapping on Edges
HidePhoneDesc: It will be hidden from settings and side menu
HidePhoneOthersDesc: It will be hidden just for you from their profile
IDTypeAbout: Telegram\'s API shows IDs as they are, while the Bot API adds a minus sign for groups and -100 for supergroups, broadcast groups and channels.
ImportSettingsAlert: Are you sure you want to import these settings?
ImportingChangesOne: 1 change will be applied to the current settings.
ImportingChangesOthers: %d changes will be applied to the current settings.
InstallBetasDesc: Test new AdvanceGram updates before their official release
InstallationBlocked: The installation was blocked by your device. Please report this issue to AdvanceGram support.
InstallationFailure: The APK file is corrupted. Please report this issue to AdvanceGram support.
InstallationWarning: Please keep the app open until the installation is complete.
KeepMarkdownDesc: When translating a message, keep the markdown formatting.
MediaStreamVoip: Use Media Stream in Video Chats
MenuItemsOrderDesc: Customize side menu items to better meet your needs.
MessageAlreadyInX: You cannot translate 1 message since it is already in %1$s.
MessagesAlreadyInX: You cannot translate %1$d messages since they are already in %2$s.
MonetIconDesc: Use Material You\'s dynamic icon on Android 12
MutualContactDesc: **%s** and you have added each other in the contacts list.
NoMoreSpace: Your phone has run out of available storage. Please free some space to download and install the update.
OnlineStatusDesc: Show the online status of other people next to their profile photo in groups
OpenArchiveOnPull: Pull down to Open the Archive
PasscodeAlreadyUsed: Passcode already used. Please choose another one.
PerformanceModeDesc: CameraX\'s quality will be reduced in favor of performance
PrivacyPolicyLogin: By continuing,\nyou agree to the *Privacy Policy*.
ResetSettingsAlert: Are you sure you want to reset AdvanceGram settings?
SameSettings: This backup contains the same changes as the current settings.
SearchIconTitleBar: Search Icon on the Title Bar
SelectAccountDesc: Choose an account to protect with a passcode.
ShowID_DC: Show ID and DC in Profiles
SlidingTitleDesc: If the chat title is long, it will scroll on the screen
SwipeToPiPDesc: Swipe up in the video player to open the video in Picture-in-Picture mode
SystemCameraDesc: Access directly the system camera (not applicable for video messages).
TestBackendOff: This account will connect to the production backend.
TestBackendOn: This account will connect to the test backend.
TranslateApiUnsupported: The translation provider you selected don\'t support your language.
TranslateOwlDesc: Help us translate AdvanceGram into your language
TranslationProviderInfo: %s may have access to the messages you translate.
TurnSoundOnVDKey: Turn Sound On by Turning Down the Volume
TurnSoundOnVDKeyDesc: Unmute videos by pressing the volume down button
UnknownInstallationError: Your device raised an unknown error. Please report this issue to AdvanceGram support.
UnlimitedFavoriteStickersDesc: It allows you to add unlimited stickers to favorites, but they may not be synced to other devices
UnlimitedPinnedChatsDesc: It allows you to pin unlimited chats by turning off their synchronization with the Telegram server
UnlockedHiddenChupaIcon: You were chuped! Chupa\'s icon is now available in settings.
UnlockedHiddenFoxIcon: Oh… Congratulations! You unlocked the little shy fox icon.
UpdateToImport: This backup is not supported by your version of AdvanceGram. Update the app to import it.
UseRearRoundVideosDesc: Record video messages with the rear camera instead of the front camera
